numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Indonesia has a high percentage of 15-to-24-year-olds who say that the world is getting better.
2. Indonesia has a high percentage of 40-year-olds who say that the world is getting better.
3. I wonder what events caused these high percentages in Indonesia.
4. In the U.S., many people who are older than 40 years think that the world is getting worse with each generation.
5. In the U.S., many people who are 15-to-24 years old think that the world is getting better with each generation.
7. I am a person who is 15-to-24 years old.
